H0.text: The Picts were an ancient tribe of people occupying what country in Roman times. Scotland

H1.text: The Picts were an ancient tribe of people occupying what country in Roman times. England

H2.text: The Picts were an ancient tribe of people occupying what country in Roman times. Wales

H3.text: The Picts were an ancient tribe of people occupying what country in Roman times. H-Alba

A4.text: The Picts were a group of peoples in what is now Scotland north of the Firth of Forth, in the Early Middle Ages.
